ModMetaData.name: MorrowRim - Scuttle
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds scuttle from Morrowind. Scuttle is a dish local to Vvardenfell, and considered somewhat of a delicacy by the Dunmer. It can be made from insect meat at the stoves once ashlands cuisine preparation is researched. Dunmer are rather fond of the dish, and will receive a minor mood boost after consuming it. Other races do not particularly enjoy eating it, and will receive a minor mood penalty.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded.
-Includes a patch that adds scuttle paste as a condiment, decreasing fatigue gain when consumed.
-Includes a patch to give Dunmer a unique thought after consuming scuttle or scuttle paste.
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
